text: Kemerovo Oblastâ€“Kuzbass (, ), also known by its short names as Kemerovo Oblast () and Kuzbass () after the Kuznetsk Basin, is a federal subject of Russia. It is located in southwestern Siberia. Kemerovo is the administrative center of the oblast, though Novokuznetsk is the largest city in the oblast. ==References==
title: Kemerovo Oblast
